tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE feedback (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(50),
    feedback_text TEXT,
    rating INT,
    feedback_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE hotel_reviews (
  review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  hotel_id INT,
  customer_id INT,
  review_text TEXT,
  rating INT,
  review_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE hotel_reviews (
  review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  hotel_id INT,
  customer_id INT,
  review_text TEXT,
  rating INT
);

CREATE TABLE hotel_reviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    hotel_id INT,
    customer_id INT,
    review TEXT,
    rating INT,
    date_created TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE feedback (
  feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  hotel_id INT,
  rating INT,
  comment TEXT
);
